page.title: 17OUR HOUSE
page.content: OUR HOUSE IS AT TONAGHGORM, LEGGS AND IS SITUATED ON THE MAIN KESH TO BELLEEK ROAD.IT IS A TWO STORY HOUSE WITH A SLATE ROOF. SURROUNDING OUR HOUSE ARE SHEDS ,SOME TREES AND GREEN FIELDS. FROM OUR HOUSE YOU CAN LOOK OUT OVER LOVELY LOUGH ERNE, CASTLE CALDWELL FOREST AND THE FLAT MOUNTAIN KNOWN AS THE BAR OF WHEALT.WE HAVE THREE BEDROOMS UPSTAIRS FOR MYSELF, MY BROTHERS AND MY PARENTS.THERE FIVE ROOMS DOWNSTAIRS,THE BATHROOM,THE HALL WHERE THE TELEPHONE IS KEPT AND WHERE MAMMY KEEPS ALL HER INDOOR PLANTS,THE KITCHEN, THE LIVING ROOM AND THE SPARE ROOM.IN THE KITCHEN THERE IS A RAYBURN ROYAL COOKER WHICH BURNS TURF AND PROVIDES HOT WATER FOR DOMESTIC USE AND FOR RADIATORS.MY FATHER IS A FARMER AND OUR COWS SUCKLE THEIR CALVES UNTIL THE CALVES ARE SOLD IN THE AUTUMN.
